description: Oral agreement for land sale without writing
facts: Alice and Bob orally agreed that Alice would sell her land to Bob for $50,000
The parties shook hands on the deal
asp_facts: contract(c1). subject_matter(c1, land). parties(c1, alice, bob). has_writing(c1, no). sale_amount(c1, 50000). has_consideration(c1, yes). has_mutual_assent(c1, yes).
question: Is this contract enforceable under the Statute of Frauds?
rationale: Contracts for the sale of land must be in writing to satisfy the Statute of Frauds. Oral agreements for land sales are unenforceable.
